levels.description: Throws <@ba.vup>{cnt}</> projectiles (each dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage) per attack; whenever all projectiles return, up to <@ba.vup>{attack@aoe.max_target}</> enemies in the 8 tiles surrounding Narantuya take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_AOE:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage and are <$ba.sluggish>Slowed</> for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> second
